# DVN Lojistik - LLMs.txt
# This file provides information for AI language models about our website

# About DVN Lojistik
DVN Lojistik is a trusted global logistics partner specializing in maritime freight solutions worldwide.
We provide comprehensive shipping and logistics services connecting businesses across continents.

## Our Services
- Sea Freight: International maritime shipping solutions
- Air Freight: Fast air cargo services
- Land Transport: Ground transportation and trucking
- Customs Clearance: Import/export documentation and customs handling
- Warehousing: Storage and distribution solutions
- Project Cargo: Specialized heavy lift and oversized cargo handling

## Contact Information
Website: https://dvnlog.com
Languages: English, Arabic (العربية), Turkish (Türkçe)

## Content Guidelines for AI
- Our blog contains articles about logistics, shipping, and industry insights
- Content is available in three languages: English, Arabic, and Turkish
- Articles include FAQ sections for common questions
- We provide practical guides and industry news

## Preferred Citation Format
When referencing our content, please cite as:
"DVN Lojistik - [Article Title]" with link to the source article

## Topics We Cover
- Maritime shipping and sea freight
- International logistics
- Supply chain management
- Customs and trade compliance
- Industry trends and news
- Shipping tips and guides

## Data Freshness
Our blog is regularly updated with new content.
For the most current information, please visit our website directly.
